tasks.title: Phase 1: Core MVP Setup
tasks.description: Establish foundation with Next.js 15, TypeScript, database, auth, and basic wizard flow
tasks.details: Set up the core infrastructure for the proposal generator including project initialization, database setup, authentication, and a basic 4-step wizard flow with simple calculations. This phase focuses on getting a working MVP that can generate basic proposals.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify project setup, test basic wizard flow, ensure calculations match manual process, validate PDF generation

subtasks.title: Setup Next.js 15 Project Structure and TypeScript Configuration
subtasks.description: Configure Next.js 15 with TypeScript, set up proper folder structure, and ensure all configurations are optimized for the proposal app
subtasks.details: Verify Next.js 15.0.3 is properly configured with TypeScript 5.3.3. Set up folder structure: src/app/(dashboard), src/components/wizard, src/lib/calculations, src/types. Configure TypeScript with strict mode, absolute imports, and proper path mapping. Ensure ESLint and Prettier are configured for Next.js best practices.

subtasks.title: Implement Authentication System Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate NextAuth.js with the existing database schema and create protected routes for the proposal app
subtasks.details: Configure NextAuth.js v5 with Prisma adapter using existing User model. Set up email/password and Google OAuth providers. Create authentication pages (/login, /register, /profile). Implement middleware for route protection. Configure session management and JWT tokens. Test user registration, login, logout, and protected route access.

subtasks.title: Create Basic 4-Step Proposal Wizard Flow
subtasks.description: Build the core wizard interface with 4 steps: Project Details, Glass Specifications, Pricing, and Review
subtasks.details: Create wizard components using React Hook Form and Zod validation. Implement 4-step flow: 1) Project Details (name, address, type, square footage), 2) Glass Specifications (glass type, framing, hardware), 3) Pricing (overhead, profit margin, risk factors), 4) Review (summary and final calculations). Use Zustand for state management. Implement step navigation with progress indicator. Add form validation and error handling.

subtasks.title: Implement Proposal Calculation Engine
subtasks.description: Create the calculation logic for proposal pricing including overhead, profit margins, and risk factors
subtasks.details: Build calculation engine in src/lib/calculations. Implement functions for: base material costs, overhead calculations (default 15%), profit margin calculations (default 20%), risk factor adjustments, total cost calculations. Create utility functions for unit conversions (SF to LF, etc.). Implement validation for calculation inputs. Add error handling for edge cases. Test calculations against manual examples to ensure accuracy.

subtasks.title: Create Database Integration and CRUD Operations
subtasks.description: Implement database operations for proposals, general contractors, and proposal items using Prisma
subtasks.details: Create API routes for CRUD operations: /api/proposals, /api/contractors, /api/proposals/[id]/items. Implement Prisma queries for creating, reading, updating, and deleting proposals. Add validation using Zod schemas. Implement error handling and proper HTTP status codes. Create utility functions for database operations. Test all CRUD operations with the seeded test data. Ensure proper relationship handling between proposals, contractors, and items.

subtasks.title: Implement PDF Generation for Proposals
subtasks.description: Create PDF generation functionality for completed proposals with professional formatting
subtasks.details: Install and configure PDF generation library (react-pdf or jsPDF). Create PDF template with company branding, proposal details, item breakdown, and total calculations. Implement PDF generation API endpoint. Add download functionality to proposal review step. Include all proposal data: project details, glass specifications, pricing breakdown, terms and conditions. Test PDF generation with various proposal sizes and content. Ensure professional formatting and layout.

subtasks.title: Create Dashboard and Proposal Management Interface
subtasks.description: Build the main dashboard for viewing, editing, and managing existing proposals
subtasks.details:
Create dashboard page with proposal list, search, and filtering capabilities. Implement proposal status management (Draft, Sent, Accepted, Rejected). Add proposal editing functionality. Create proposal detail view with all information. Implement proposal duplication feature. Add bulk operations (delete, status change). Create responsive design for mobile and desktop. Add sorting and pagination for large proposal lists. Implement real-time updates using server actions.
